argument.name: preserved_string
argument.description: A character string generated by the CASE_PRESERVE()function.

page.description: Restore a string from its case information.
page.discussion: CASE_RESTORE() returns the original character string (encoded by the CASE_PRESERVE()function) with its initial pattern of upper and lower case characters.
page.example: dim astr as C astr = "Alpha Software" astr = case_preserve(astr) astr -> "Alpha Software8200" astr = lower(astr) astr -> "alpha software8200" astr = case_restore(astr) astr -> "Alpha Software"
